entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Question] interoperability of Redis backplane, with Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR #46105
  • Azure B2C logout endpoint does not redirect to the post_logout_redirect_uri when logout performed in YARP middleware #46104
  • Blazor User.Identity seems to be null #46102
  • avoid to render whole application in startup #46101
  • Blazor Hotrelopad generic #46100
  • Duplicate logging ID and name in health checks #46099

Closed

  • Perf improvement: caching #46081
  • Please consider adding multipart-form-data #46103
  • Browser is flooded with Correlation and Nonce cookies after logging into Azure. #46053
  • [Blazor] Allow component resx files to be named razor.resx to allow nesting #46051
  • Using SignalR in Unity - The method or operation is not implemented #45586
  • Put the query parameters into RouteData.RouteValues #46047
  • Conflicting assembly reference causing the application to break #45068
    Discussions
  • DistributedSession always loads session in CommitAsync even when session is not modified #42009
    6.0.x
  • `Challenge` vs `ChallengeResult` #46076

PullRequests

Updated

  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • Flags enum provided as list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • consider escaped commas in LDAP distinguished name #45649
    area-security, community-contribution
  • string.Split to Span.Split #46098
    Perf
  • Fix Blazor PageContext disposal #46097
    area-blazor
  • Update tests to reflect change of web app manifest extension in React C# template #43765
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Change web app manifest extension to “webmanifest” #43756
    area-mvc, community-contribution, .NET 8 Planning
  • Run test on Linux and Mac #45642
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Wrong replication of resource names in embedded file provider #46067
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Call CloseAsync instead of CloseOutputAsync in the browser #46012
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • fix trace id value, introduce traceparent #44680
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
